lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "While GM has just taken 100,00 units out of second quarter production already because of weak sales, the continuation of this weakening market share suggests another production cutback is likely," Glantz said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But a slowly expanding economy, an exploding stock market and a growing array of incentives have lured customers to dealers' showrooms, analysts said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S plants posted these results during the March 21 to 31 period -- American Motors Corp <AMC> 1,198, down 50 pct, Volkswagen 2,145, down from 3,342, American Honda 16,635, up from 6,358, and Nissan 4,635, up from 2,536.
